sentences.sentence: Panzer Grenadiers Max builders set from 12 to 6. This will reduce the construction speed of Panzer Elite infantry.
sentences.translation: 装甲精英现在最多只能有6个士兵同时建造建筑(以前为12个)。这将降低装甲精英步兵的建筑速度。

sentences.sentence: Then he passed to the frontier of Italy, and was one of the thirty grenadiers who defended the Col DE Tende with Joubert.
sentences.translation: 随后，他转到了意大利前线，他是和茹贝尔保卫坦达谷的那三十个卫队之一。

sentences.sentence: Panzer Grenadiers and Fallschirmjagers have their passive mine detection re-enabled. Mines within 10m will be detected when the PGs are immobile for 3 seconds.
sentences.translation: 装甲掷弹兵和德国伞兵的被动探雷技能被重新启动。现在装甲掷弹兵静止3秒就能探出10米内的地雷。
